items.name: Assorted Sushi Platter

items.description: Deviled eggs with a hint of truffle oil.

items.description: Golden-fried calamari served with zesty marinara sauce.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushroom caps stuffed with a blend of herbs and cream cheese.

items.name: Smoked Salmon Crostini
items.description: Sliced smoked salmon on crispy crostini with dill cream cheese.

items.name: Artisan Cheese Board
items.description: Assorted cheeses, fruits, and nuts with a side of honey.

items.name: Shrimp Cocktail
items.description: Chilled shrimp served with tangy cocktail sauce.

items.name: Kale and Quinoa Salad
items.description: Fresh kale and quinoa with a citrus vinaigrette.

items.name: Mango Avocado Salad
items.description: Mixed greens with mango, avocado, and cilantro-lime dressing.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

items.name: Vegetarian Paella
items.description: Saffron-infused rice with an assortment of vegetables.

items.name: Lobster Risotto
items.description: Creamy risotto with lobster tail and asparagus.

items.name: Wild Mushroom Ravioli
items.description: Ravioli stuffed with a medley of wild mushrooms in a truffle cream sauce.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone.

items.name: Pistachio White Chocolate Tart
items.description: Buttery tart filled with pistachio cream and white chocolate.

items.name: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Mixed Berry Parfait
items.description: Layers of mixed berries, yogurt, and granola.

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.description: Vanilla custard with a caramelized sugar crust.

items.name: Apple Pie a la Mode
items.description: Homemade apple pie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Chocolate-covered Strawberries
items.description: Fresh strawberries dipped in rich chocolate.

items.name: Dhokla Platter
items.description: Assorted dhokla variations served with mint and tamarind chutneys.

items.name: Undhiyu Thali
items.description: Traditional Gujarati thali featuring undhiyu, puri, rice, and a variety of side dishes.

items.name: Khandvi Rolls
items.description: Delicate rolls made from gram flour, yogurt, and spices, garnished with mustard seeds and coriander.

items.name: Gujarati Kadhi
items.description: Spiced yogurt soup with gram flour dumplings, tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

items.name: Bharela Bhinda (Stuffed Okra)
items.description: Okra stuffed with a flavorful mixture of spices and besan (gram flour).

items.description: Puris served with a sweet mango puree, a classic Gujarati combination.

items.name: Dal Dhokli
items.description: Wheat flour dumplings cooked in a spicy lentil soup, a hearty and comforting dish.

items.name: Puran Poli
items.description: Traditional Marathi flatbread stuffed with sweet lentil filling, served with ghee.

items.name: Misal Pav
items.description: Spicy sprouted lentil curry topped with farsan and served with pav (bread rolls).

items.name: Bharli Vangi
items.description: Eggplants stuffed with a spiced masala and cooked to perfection.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mixed vegetable curry served with buttered pav (bread rolls) and garnished with coriander.

items.name: Matki Usal
items.description: Sprouted moth beans cooked with spices, coconut, and served as a side dish.

items.name: Puri Bhaji
items.description: Fluffy puris served with aloo bhaji (spiced potato curry).

items.name: Masale Bhaat
items.description: Spiced rice cooked with vegetables and aromatic Maharashtrian spices.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

items.name: Eggplant Rollatini
items.description: Thinly sliced eggplant rolled and stuffed with ricotta cheese, baked in marinara sauce.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Spaghetti tossed with eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

items.name: Gnocchi with Pesto Sauce
items.description: Soft potato gnocchi tossed in a vibrant pesto sauce.

items.name: Cheeseburger Deluxe
items.description: Classic beef burger with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

items.name: Loaded Nachos
items.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, sour cream, and guacamole.

items.name: Chili Cheese Fries
items.description: Golden fries topped with hearty chili and melted cheese.

items.name: Deep-Fried Mac 'n' Cheese Bites
items.description: Creamy mac 'n' cheese bites coated in a crispy golden crust.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza Rolls
items.description: Rolled pizza dough stuffed with pepperoni and mozzarella, baked to perfection.

items.name: Oreo Milkshake
items.description: A decadent milkshake blended with Oreo cookies and topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Dhokla Pops
items.description: Miniature dhoklas served on sticks, perfect for snacking.

items.name: Khandvi Rolls
items.description: Delicate gram flour rolls filled with a spiced coconut and mustard paste.

items.name: Fafda Nachos
items.description: Crispy fafda chips served with tangy tamarind chutney and yogurt.

items.name: Thepla Sliders
items.description: Soft thepla bread filled with spicy potato filling, served as sliders.

items.name: Gathiya Tacos
items.description: Crunchy gathiya pieces served taco-style with shredded cabbage and chutney.

items.name: Sev Puri Pizza
items.description: Mini pizza topped with sev, chutneys, and diced vegetables in a fusion twist.

items.name: Chakri Nachos Supreme
items.description: Spiral-shaped chakri snacks piled high with cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

items.name: Masala Dosa Burger
items.description: A fusion delight with a masala dosa filling in a burger bun, served with chutney mayo.

items.name: Chilli Idli Bites
items.description: Crispy and spicy bite-sized idlis tossed in a flavorful chili sauce.

items.name: Curry Leaf Fries
items.description: Golden fries seasoned with curry leaves, mustard seeds, and spices.

items.name: Paneer Tikka Pizza Uttapam
items.description: Uttapam topped with paneer tikka, bell peppers, and cheese, resembling a pizza.

items.name: Vada Pav Sliders
items.description: Mini vada pav sliders with spiced potato patties and chutney in soft buns.

items.name: Coconut Chili Popcorn
items.description: Popcorn coated in a blend of coconut, chili powder, and traditional spices.

items.name: Schezwan Dosa Rolls
items.description: Dosa rolls filled with a spicy Schezwan sauce, vegetables, and Indo-Chinese flavors.
